fxInfo_citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document) and UNU-WIDER(2017).
fxInfo_clarification: Distribution of income expressed as a Gini coefficient (aka Gini index, Gini ratio). Missing data is imputed, as follows, using linear models (a reasonable imputation procedure in this instance given the stickiness of the variable of interest). Step 1: Missing data within a time-series is interpolated. Step 2: Missing data from the last recorded data point to 2012 (less than a decade in all cases) is filled by repeating the last observation.
fxInfo_question: How unequal is the distribution of income?
name: e_peginiwi
